scripts.scss: sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/critical.scss src/site/_includes/critical.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/non-critical.scss dist/assets/css/non-critical.css
scripts.js: cat src/js/* > src/site/_includes/scripts.js && uglifyjs src/site/_includes/scripts.js -m -o src/site/_includes/scripts.js
scripts.build:assets: npm run styles && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && npm run build:site
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && run-p serve watch
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.js *.json
